content: the ombre blossom cowl allows your colorful or ombre yarn to bloom make a complete crochet cowl with approximately 200 yards of worsted or dk weight yarn the cowl is crocheted in the round and from the bottom up using a modified granny stitch pattern the last row will be your top edging row then you will go back and join yarn to add the edging to the bottom edge of the cowl the edging gives the cowl a nice polished look this pattern is for one size but there are directions to modify the size included in the pattern your gauge will be about 3-4 stitches per inch depending on your own personal gauge and the yarn you choose to use **copyright cj brady designs 2017**--all photos pdf pattern files and text © cj brady designs 2017-2020 do not post photos text or pdf documents without my permission unauthorized posting of my pdf pattern files is forbidden
